dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Prefers to inhabit pools and areas along banks of swift, clear, cool, well-oxygenated highland streams.  A midwater swimmer, never found at the surface and seldom on the bottom, over hard substrates composed of smooth rocks, gravel, or sand.  Feeds on algae, aquatic plants and insect larvae.
